lead_paragraph: Russia was among 14 countries which signed a convention between the Council of Europe and European soccer body UEFA on Sunday aimed at stopping a repeat of fan violence which has marred Euro 2016.

headline.print_headline: UEFA Says New Convention Can Avoid Repeat of Euro 2016 Violence
headline.main: UEFA Says New Convention Can Avoid Repeat of Euro 2016 Violence

snippet: Russia was among 14 countries which signed a convention between the Council of Europe and European soccer body UEFA on Sunday aimed at stopping a repeat of fan violence which has marred Euro 2016....
